channel.title: Comments on: And Now the TV is hung

item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>One day Matt & I will have one but we'll probably be in our 50's or something, I could imagine a tv on our wall in our small home, witha round the corner sofa, City Gardener started again last night, I completly recommend watching it, he's very good and doesn't even own a garden himeself! Matt & I have been recently been planting with Mum's help in our back car park area and it's starting to look like more than nettles and junk, it looks green & soon will look flowery too!! I think an evening to test your Tv is called for Matthew!</p>
item.content:encoded: One day Matt & I will have one but we’ll probably be in our 50’s or something, I could imagine a tv on our wall in our small home, witha round the corner sofa, City Gardener started again last night, I completly recommend watching it, he’s very good and doesn’t even own a garden himeself! Matt & I have been recently been planting with Mum’s help in our back car park area and it’s starting to look like more than nettles and junk, it looks green & soon will look flowery too!! I think an evening to test your Tv is called for Matthew!

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>Sounds very relaxing. I'm only surprised you haven't had one of the these TVs before! Just hope that your brother doesn't start wanting one now!</p>
item.content:encoded: Sounds very relaxing. I’m only surprised you haven’t had one of the these TVs before! Just hope that your brother doesn’t start wanting one now!
